name: react-native-adk-chat
description: React Native ADK Chat - Google Agent Engine integration with proxy service

scripts.demo:agentengine: concurrently --kill-others --names "PROXY,DEMO_APP" --prefix-colors "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "PORT=3000 AGENT_ENGINE_URL=$AGENT_ENGINE_URL GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS=$GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS pnpm --filter @react-native-adk-chat/server-agentengine start" "EXPO_PUBLIC_PROXY_BASE_URL=http://localhost:3000 pnpm --filter @react-native-adk-chat/demo-app start"
scripts.demo:cloudrun: concurrently --kill-others --names "PROXY,DEMO_APP" --prefix-colors "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "PORT=3000 CLOUD_RUN_URL=$CLOUD_RUN_URL DEFAULT_APP_NAME=$DEFAULT_APP_NAME pnpm --filter @anthropic/adk-proxy-cloudrun start" "EXPO_PUBLIC_PROXY_BASE_URL=http://localhost:3000 pnpm --filter @react-native-adk-chat/demo-app start"
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --workspace=packages/server-agentengine && npm install --workspace=packages/server-cloudrun
